    • Making an antigenic map from titer data

Getting and setting map attributes

Source: vignettes/getting-and-setting-map-attributes.Rmd
getting-and-setting-map-attributes.Rmd

Once you have a map data object after either making a map or loading a map you will want to be able to access and manipulate map properties.

General map attributes

Function Description
c("titerTable", "agCoords", "srCoords", "name", "titerTableLayers")() The titer table
c("titerTable", "agCoords", "srCoords", "name", "titerTableLayers")() Antigen coordinates
c("titerTable", "agCoords", "srCoords", "name", "titerTableLayers")() Serum coordinates
c("titerTable", "agCoords", "srCoords", "name", "titerTableLayers")() Map name
c("titerTable", "agCoords", "srCoords", "name", "titerTableLayers")() Titer measurement data

Antigen and sera attributes

Antigens

Function Description
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Antigen names
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Antigen IDs
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Antigen groups
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Full antigen names
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Abbreviated antigen names
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Antigen dates
c("agNames", "agIDs", "agGroups", "agNamesFull", "agNamesAbbreviated", "agDates", "agReference")() Is antigen a reference virus

Sera

Function Description
c("srNames", "srIDs", "srGroups", "srNamesFull", "srNamesAbbreviated")() Sera names
c("srNames", "srIDs", "srGroups", "srNamesFull", "srNamesAbbreviated")() Sera IDs
c("srNames", "srIDs", "srGroups", "srNamesFull", "srNamesAbbreviated")() Sera groups
c("srNames", "srIDs", "srGroups", "srNamesFull", "srNamesAbbreviated")() Full sera names
c("srNames", "srIDs", "srGroups", "srNamesFull", "srNamesAbbreviated")() Abbreviated sera names

Attributes related to plotting

Antigens Sera Description
agShown() srShown() Point shown
agSize() srSize() Point size
agFill() srFill() Point fill color
agOutline() srOutline() Point outline color
agOutlineWidth() srOutlineWidth() Point outline width
agRotation() srRotation() Point rotation
agAspect() srAspect() Point aspect
agShape() srShape() Point shape
agDrawingOrder() srDrawingOrder() Point drawing order

Attributes related to optimization runs

Function Description
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() The selected optimization number
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Antigen base coordinates
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Sera base coordinates
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map comment
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map minimum column bases
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Number of map dimensions
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map transformation
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map translation
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map stress
c("selectedOptimization", "agBaseCoords", "srBaseCoords", "mapComment", "minColBasis", "mapDimensions", "mapTransformation", "mapTranslation", "mapStress", "colBases")() Map column bases
